author: S. Vijay Kumar
title: Indian Railways apprehend "enormous" rush to hospitals soon
description: The Indian Railways, which is the largest employer in the country, has a wide network of multi-speciality hospitals.
content:
The Indian Railways apprehend an "enormous" rush to hospitals soon and have decided to hire the services of retired para-medical staff.
In a note to all General Managers of Zonal Railways and Production Units, the Railway Board on Saturday said "keeping in v… [+1518 chars]
